front.title: Control and Monitoring Differentiated Service Code Point in Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (TWAMP)

abstract.t: This document describes an optional extension for Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (TWAMP) allowing control and monitoring of the Differentiated Service Code Point (DSCP) field in forward and reverse directions within single test session with the TWAMP-Test protocol. This document, if accepted, will be an update to the TWAMP core protocol specified in RFC 5357 and DSCP Monitoring mode defined in RFC 7750 .
